TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示由 W3C 定义的 XML 数字签名封装签名转换。

span.span: Represents the enveloped signature transform for an XML digital signature as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中删除``元素从 XML 文档之前，可以计算摘要。The class removes the `` element from an XML document before the digest is computed. 使用此转换，也可以登录并验证 XML 文档的 XML 数字签名元素除外的所有元素。With this transform, you can sign and verify all elements of an XML document except the XML digital signature elements. 尽管可以创建和插入 XML 文档签名，验证经过修改的文档使用嵌入的签名将失败，因为该文档现在包含其他元素。Although you can create and insert a signature into an XML document, verifying the modified document using the embedded signature will fail because the document now has additional elements. 此转换将移除``元素，并允许您以验证使用其原始格式的文档。This transform removes the `` element and allows you to verify the document using its original form. 使用类每当创建封装的签名中。Use the class whenever you create an enveloped signature. 封装的签名转换有关的详细信息，请参阅部分 6.6.4 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。For more information about the enveloped signature transform, see Section 6.6.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何对 XML 文件使用封装签名进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. 第二个示例演示如何使用的成员类。The second example demonstrates how to use members of the class. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform/cpp/members.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

span.span: Parses the specified as transform-specific content of a element and configures the internal state of the current object to match the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为没有特定于转换的内容针对定义，对此方法的调用不会更改所转换的状态。Because no transform-specific content is defined for , a call to this method does not change the state of the transform. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用使用指定的方法对象配置当前对象。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method using the specified object to configure the current object. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
